property.name: min_temp
property.description: minimum measurable temperature, multiple entries imply differences in error margin depending on the temperature

property.name: max_temp
property.description: maximum measurable temperature, multiple entries imply differences in error margin depending on the temperature

property.name: error_margin
property.description: error margin in reading, can have multiple depending on current temperature range, first error_margin entry being appliable when between first entry of min_temp and max_temp, and so on

property.name: min_operating_temp
property.description: minimum temperature before the thermometer stops working

property.name: max_operating_temp
property.description: maximum temperature before the thermometer stops working

property.name: measuring
property.description: what the thermometer measures the temperature from
